SERVICE AGREEMENT

This AGREEMENT is made on {{agreement_date}}.

BETWEEN:
{{company_name}}, a company incorporated under the laws of {{company_jurisdiction}}, with its registered office at {{company_address}} (hereinafter "Company")
AND
{{contractor_name}}, an individual residing at {{contractor_address}} (hereinafter "Contractor").

WHEREAS the Company desires to engage the Contractor for {{service_description}}, and the Contractor agrees to provide such services.

NOW THEREFORE, the parties agree as follows:

1. SERVICES
The Contractor shall provide the following services:
- {{scope_of_work}}

2. FEES
The Company shall pay the Contractor a fixed fee of {{fee_amount}} upon completion of the milestones.

3. TERM
This Agreement shall commence on {{start_date}} and terminate on {{end_date}}.

4. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of {{governing_law}}.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement.

Signed:
________________
{{company_name}}

Signed:
________________
{{contractor_name}}
